pr_title: Explicitly disable transaction hive tables in TestTablePartitioningSelect

timeline.bodyText: let's not add it to the group. it's already heavy
timeline.author: findepi

replies.bodyText: Sure, removed. It just won't run against hdp3.1 until we add the rest of the tests in.
replies.author: alexjo2144

timeline.message:
Explicitly disable transaction hive tables in TestTablePartitioningSelect

Hive 3.1 enables transactional tables when ORC is used by default but the test
does not work when run against transactional tables
